title: Racist jailed after chasing young boys with ‘Dirty Harry-style’ gun
content: A drunk man has been jailed after he shouted racist threats to kill two young boys and followed them into their garden waving a gun.  Christopher Jones, 49, has been locked up for four years after the unprovoked incident in Stockton in April.  The huge, eight-inch long black gas powered revolver Jones used to threaten two boys, aged 10 and 16, was shown to Judge Sean Morris at a sentencing hearing at Teesside Crown Court.  The judge remarked: ‘It’s like something out of a Dirty Harry movie.’  Prosecutor Harry Hadfield told how Jones had shouted ‘I’ll kill you black *****’ at the boys before...
